verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G4671>"You<s%> <S%G2010>may<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G4572>yourself.<s%>" <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> stretched <S%G1614>out<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and made his <S%G626>defense.<s%>

"I <S%G2233>think<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G3107>happy,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> that I <S%G3195>am<s%> to make my <S%G626>defense<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> all the <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I am <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%>

<S%G3122>especially<s%> because <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1109>expert<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5037>customs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1352>questions<s%> which <S%G2596>are<s%> <S%G2453>among<s%> the <S%G1485>Jews.<s%> <S%G1189>Therefore<s%> I <S%G4675>beg<s%> <S%G3116>you<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> me <S%G3450>patiently.<s%>

<S%G3303>"Indeed,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2467>know<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> way of <S%G3767>life<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> my <S%G3503>youth<s%> <S%G3588>up,<s%> which <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> my <S%G3450>own<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> and <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem;<s%>

having <S%G4267>known<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> from the <S%G509>first,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they are <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G3140>testify,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G196>strictest<s%> <S%G139>sect<s%> of <S%G2251>our<s%> <S%G2356>religion<s%> I <S%G2198>lived<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>Now<s%> I <S%G2476>stand<s%> here to be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%>

<S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> twelve <S%G1722>tribes,<s%> <S%G1616>earnestly<s%> <S%G3000>serving<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G2658>attain.<s%> <S%G4012>Concerning<s%> <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> I am <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa!<s%>
<S%G5101>Why<s%> is it <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G571>incredible<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> does <S%G1453>raise<s%> the <S%G3498>dead?<s%>

<S%G1473>"I<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> most <S%G3767%G99999>certainly<s%> <S%G1380>thought<s%> that I <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G4238>do<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G1727>contrary<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth.<s%>

<S%G3739>This<s%> <S%G4160>I<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2623>both<s%> shut <S%G2623>up<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> in <S%G5438>prisons,<s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were put to <S%G337>death<s%> I <S%G2702>gave<s%> my <S%G5586>vote<s%> against <S%G2702>them.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5097>Punishing<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> I tried to <S%G315>make<s%> them <S%G987>blaspheme.<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G1693>Being<s%> <S%G4057>exceedingly<s%> <S%G1693>enraged<s%> against <S%G846>them,<s%> I <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> them <S%G2193>even<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1854>foreign<s%> <S%G4172>cities.<s%>

<S%G3739>"Whereupon<s%> <S%G2532>as<s%> I <S%G4198>traveled<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1154>Damascus<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2011>commission<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests,<s%>

<S%G2250>at<s%> <S%G3319>noon,<s%> O <S%G935>king,<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2596>on<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> a <S%G5457>light<s%> from <S%G5228>the<s%> <S%G3771>sky,<s%> <S%G2987>brighter<s%> than the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> shining <S%G4034>around<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4198>traveled<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G2257>we<s%> had <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2667>fallen<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G2980>saying<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2532%G99999><s%> in the <S%G1446>Hebrew<s%> <S%G1258>language,<s%> <S%G4549><s%>" 'Saul, Saul,4549 why5101 are you persecuting1377 me?3165 It is hard4642 for you4671 to kick2979 against4314 the goads.2759'"

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G450>arise,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I have <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> this <S%G5124>purpose:<s%> to <S%G4400>appoint<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> a <S%G5257>servant<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G1492>seen,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> of the things <S%G3739>which<s%> I will <S%G3700>reveal<s%> to <S%G4671>you;<s%>

<S%G1807>delivering<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3568><s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%>

to <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> they may <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from the <S%G1849>power<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> that <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G2819>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%>'"
<S%G3606>"Therefore,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to the <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3701>vision,<s%>

<S%G1752>For<s%> this <S%G5130>reason<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4815>seized<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and <S%G3987>tried<s%> to kill <S%G1315>me.<s%>

<S%G1487>how<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3195>must<s%> <S%G3805>suffer,<s%> and <S%G1487>how,<s%> by the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> he would be <S%G4413>first<s%> to <S%G2605>proclaim<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> both to these <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>"

<S%G1161>As<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%> made his <S%G626>defense,<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3972>"Paul,<s%> you are <S%G3105>crazy!<s%> Your <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1121>learning<s%> is <S%G4062>driving<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3130>insane!<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G5346>said,<s%> "I <S%G3105>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3105>crazy,<s%> most <S%G2903>excellent<s%> <S%G5347>Festus,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> boldly <S%G669>declare<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4997>reasonableness.<s%>

<S%G935>King<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> do <S%G4100>you<s%> believe the <S%G4396>prophets?<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G4100>believe.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G1722>Paul,<s%> "With a little <S%G3982>persuasion<s%> <S%G1096>are<s%> you trying to <S%G1096>make<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> a <S%G5546>Christian?<s%>"

<S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G302>"I<s%> <S%G2172%G99999>pray<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2172>that<s%> whether with little or with <S%G3756>much,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> this <S%G4594>day,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>might<s%> <S%G4183>become<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G3697>as<s%> <S%G1722>I<s%> <S%G1510>am,<s%> <S%G3924>except<s%> for <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1199>bonds.<s%>"

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> rose <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> the <S%G2232>governor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G959>Bernice,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4775>sat<s%> with <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> they had <S%G402>withdrawn,<s%> they <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G4314>one<s%> to <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4238>does<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1199>bonds.<s%>"
